testCases.explanation: 'aab' can be split as ['a','a','b'] (all single chars are palindromes) or ['aa','b'] ('aa' is a palindrome).
Single character is always a palindrome.
Only valid partition: each character separately. 'ab' itself is not a palindrome.
Can split as two single 'a's or as one palindrome 'aa'.
Either each char individually, or 'aba' itself which is a palindrome.

description:
Given a string `s`, partition `s` such that every substring of the partition is a palindrome. Return all possible palindrome partitioning of `s`.

See the full problem on [LeetCode 131](https://leetcode.com/problems/palindrome-partitioning/).
constraints: s consists only of lowercase English letters
